Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

CloudwatchLogsEnabled.description: The property specifies whether to enable the Cloudwatch log.

NumberOfJobs.description: The number of parallel jobs that trigger parallel threads to unload the tables from the source, and then load them to the target.

SelectionRules.description: The property specifies the rules of selecting objects for data migration.

CDCStartPosition.description: The property is a point in the database engine's log that defines a time where you can begin CDC.

CDCStartTime.description: The property indicates the start time for a change data capture (CDC) operation. The value is server time in UTC format.

CDCStopTime.description: The property indicates the stop time for a change data capture (CDC) operation. The value is server time in UTC format.

SlotName.description: The property sets the name of a previously created logical replication slot for a change data capture (CDC) load of the source instance.

DataMigrationName.description: The property describes a name to identify the data migration.

DataMigrationArn.description: The property describes an ARN of the data migration.

DataMigrationIdentifier.description: The property describes an ARN of the data migration.

DataMigrationCreateTime.description: The property describes the create time of the data migration.

ServiceAccessRoleArn.description: The property describes Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service access role.

MigrationProjectIdentifier.description: The property describes an identifier for the migration project. It is used for describing/deleting/modifying can be name/arn

DataMigrationType.description: The property describes the type of migration.

DataMigrationSettings.description: The property describes the settings for the data migration.

SourceDataSettings.description: The property describes the settings for the data migration.

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
